Module webfx.extras.panes
Package dev.webfx.extras.panes

Class CollapsePane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
dev.webfx.extras.panes.LayoutPane
dev.webfx.extras.panes.MonoPane
dev.webfx.extras.panes.MonoClipPane
dev.webfx.extras.panes.CollapsePane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class CollapsePane extends MonoClipPane
A Pane that can be collapsed (and then expanded) programmatically, or through user interaction (see static methods). This is a first version where collapse works only from bottom to top. Other directions will be added later.
Author:
Bruno Salmon
